columns.name: EXPORT_CUSTOMER
columns.comment: 0 = Not an exporter; 1 = exporter of goods

columns.name: LANGUAGE_CODE
columns.comment: The normal language code for the record

columns.name: SALES_OFFICE
columns.comment: Unique identifier of a sales office

columns.name: STATEMENT_ACCOUNT
columns.comment: Account code to which statements are sent

columns.name: PRIME_ADDRESS_LINE
columns.comment: Primary address line number for outputting onto reports

columns.name: PAYMENT_TERM
columns.comment: Unique identifier for a payment term

columns.name: UNINVOICED_BALANCE
columns.comment: Balance of outstanding orders which have been allocated

columns.name: CHANGE_USER
columns.comment: The user entering or last updating the record

columns.name: WITHDRAWN_DATE
columns.comment: The date the record was withdrawn from service

columns.name: LAST_USED
columns.comment: The date the entity was last used

columns.name: CUSTOMER_KEY1
columns.comment: 1st customer key - A means of categorising customers

columns.name: CUSTOMER_KEY2
columns.comment: 2nd customer key - A means of categorising customers

columns.name: CUSTOMER_KEY3
columns.comment: 3rd customer key - A means of categorising customers

columns.name: CUSTOMER_KEY4
columns.comment: 4th customer key - A means of categorising customers

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.comment: Date on which the record was first created

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_ID
columns.comment: Identifies a set of exchange rates

columns.name: TEXT_NUMBER
columns.comment: Unique identifier of a text storage record.

columns.name: AUTO_SUBSTITUTION
columns.comment: 0=never accept substitutes 1=always accepts substitutes 2=ask if substitute accepted

columns.name: ADDRESS_ID
columns.comment: Together with customer account identifies a customer address

columns.name: UNINVOICED_VAT
columns.comment: Value of uninvoiced VAT for stock which has been allocated

columns.name: MAIN_CONTACT_ID
columns.comment: Identifier of the main customer contact

columns.name: PROFORMA
columns.comment: Indicates whether a proforma invoice is required(0=NO,1=YES)

columns.name: PROSPECT_STATUS
columns.comment: Defines a prospect status from prospect status table.

columns.name: UNFORMATTED_NAME
columns.comment: Name in upper case and without unnecessary spacing

columns.name: SALES_TEXT
columns.comment: text storage number for sales comments

columns.name: INCLUDE_EXCLUDE
columns.comment: 0=allow customers to buy products in exclusion group 1= prevent customers from buying products in group

columns.name: WAREHOUSE_BALANCE
columns.comment: Balance of orders in status of picking/picked/despatched

columns.name: WAREHOUSE_VAT
columns.comment: Vat value for orders being picked/picked/despatched

columns.name: RETRO_REBATE
columns.comment: 1=Retro rebate available , 0 = retro rebate not applicable

columns.name: STATEMENT_PRINT_TYPE
columns.comment: 0=No print,1=Open items only,2=Items in period + open items

columns.name: INVOICE_CONSOLIDATION
columns.comment: 0 = One invoice per despatch, 1 = Consolidate by customer account, 2 = Cosilidate by delivery address, 3 = Cosolidate by customer order number

columns.name: SINGLE_BATCH_ALLOC
columns.comment: 1=Allocate stock from a single batch , 0= multiple batches allowed

columns.name: PICK_LIST_TEXT
columns.comment: reference to text comments held on text storage table

columns.name: PRINT_RRP
columns.comment: 1=print recommended retail price on documents, 0= do not print RRP

columns.name: PRINT_DESPATCH_VALUES
columns.comment: 1=print values on despatch not, 0= do not print values

columns.name: MIN_MARGIN_DEFAULT
columns.comment: Default minimum margin allowed for customer

columns.name: MESSAGE_START_DATE
columns.comment: The number of bonus points earned by the customer.

columns.name: MESSAGE_END_DATE
columns.comment: Determines how the sales message should be displayed for the customer - 0 = permanently, 1= once only 2 = only between the start and end dates

columns.name: FIRST_ORDER_DATE
columns.comment: Can only be entered if the MESSAGE_TYPE is set to 2. The start date must be entered; if this is set.

columns.name: FIRST_ORDER_NUMBER
columns.comment: Can only be entered if the MESSAGE_TYPE is set to 2. the end date must be entered; if this is set.

columns.name: LAST_EXTERNAL_CHANGE
columns.comment: Name of External system for data source

columns.name: DP_STATEMENT_DATE
columns.comment: Date the New DP Statement was created or last updated
